channel.title: Just need a simple text edit
channel.description:
Since I have no idea how to use photoshop and my sister needs this TODAY, I thought one of you could do it.
I need the word 'Twisted', in which it looks like it is being twisted like wringing out a towel. I need the font to be colored white. I need the outsides to the middle to go from bigger to smaller. Obviously I need it to be readable. The default font used does not matter, I really just want it basic. This will be going on a T-shirt which is black.
Thanks in advance, if you have any questions let me know.

item.title: Just need a simple text edit
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:3, topic:348588”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=444967.msg3267490#msg3267490 date=1278967285]
How do you expect it to be twisted like a towel and be readable? D: I’m trying it atm and nothing is really readable, stuf is upside down and shit. Not nice
[/quote]

Don’t actually twist it, use the Free Transform tool (CTRL+T) and arc the upper and lower halves inward in the middle.[/quote]

Yeah, that’s what I’m looking for. The sides of the word should be larger than the middle, but I want it be readable and a good size. Remember, this is going on a T-Shirt.

Also, if you could, I have seen a barbwire effect that can be added to the text. If you can do that, it would be great as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Just need a simple text edit

item.title: Just need a simple text edit
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

BloodRayne:

How do you expect it to be twisted like a towel and be readable? D: I’m trying it atm and nothing is really readable, stuf is upside down and shit. Not nice

Don’t actually twist it, use the Free Transform tool (CTRL+T) and arc the upper and lower halves inward in the middle.
